questions.question: what is the distribution of cosmetics types and products in four dimensions

answer.value:
Cosmetics shows a very wide distribution across the price axis.
Cosmetics sales volume is spread across the entire spectrum.
Cosmetics generates the widest range of revenue, covering almost the entire vertical space of this axis (from ~51 to ~9866).
Shipping costs for Cosmetics are moderate to high.

key_insights: Cosmetics consistently has the highest Price (closer to 99.17), indicating it is positioned as a premium or high-end category.
Corresponding to the high price, the Revenue generated is also the highest among the three categories.
Shipping costs for cosmetics are scattered, suggesting a lack of consistent economies of scale in logistics for this category.

reasoning.reasoning: We want to let lines of cosmetics type more  conspicuous
